definitions.text: an upward slope or grade (as in a road)
examples: the car couldn't make it up the rise

definitions.text: an event that involves rising to a higher point (as in altitude or temperature or intensity etc.)

examples: it was a difficult climb to the top

definitions.text: go upward with gradual or continuous progress
examples: Did you ever climb up the hill behind your house?
Sales were climbing after prices were lowered
The path climbed all the way to the top of the hill
This young man knows how to climb the social ladder

definitions.text: increase in value or to a higher point
examples: the value of our house rose sharply last year
